thread.title: UK Government rejects call to cancel Donald Trump’s state visit
thread.title_full: UK Government rejects call to cancel Donald Trump’s state visit

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: UK Government rejects call to cancel Donald Trump’s state visit
text:
The UK government has said it will not be cancelling Donald Trump’s state visit adding that it would ‘undo everything’ from his talks with Theresa May.
Nearly 1,000,000 people have signed a petition to prevent Trump from receiving the full trappings of a state visit.
A huge protest has also been organised for this evening outside Downing Street, calling on the Government to reconsider the state visit planned for some point later this year.
Jeremy Corbyn said it was ‘totally wrong’ for the visit to go ahead while other politicians have condemned the move.
